  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/workspaces/{workspace_name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing workspace configuration, allowing modification of admin settings, mandatory dimensions, and workspace properties. Validates config version existence if provided.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workspace_name","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"juspay"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"workspace_admin_email":{"type":"string"},"config_version":{"type":"string"},"mandatory_dimensions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"workspace_status":{"type":"string","enum":["ENABLED","DISABLED"],"title":"WorkspaceStatus"},"metrics":{},"allow_experiment_self_approval":{"type":"boolean"},"auto_populate_control":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["workspace_admin_email"],"title":"UpdateWorkspaceRequestContent"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
